subject: Re: [junit] F****** Kama Sutra pics
msgSnippet: ... I expect you are right. In our two most recent instances (Kamal and tlroche) that I followed up off list, it appears not to be their pc s that are
messageBody:
Anand Nene wrote:

> And this might just be the beginning! Now expect to see similar
> mails coming up using other ids as well (owner + mod included)!
> Basically not letting [junit] have any unmoderated members.
I expect you are right. In our two most recent instances (Kamal and
tlroche) that I followed up off list, it appears not to be their pc's
that are infected.
> - - Meanwhile Mark (and moderators), you guys could zero in on those
> members using Windows and are active (since first such strike)
> and probably moderate them only. Other OS (Linux/Unix/Mac) users
> may be left unmoderated (Would save you guys some time till the
> issue is not sorted out). I see some moderators are windows
> users, so please moderate yourself as well.
We don't have the detail of the O/S being used by each poster, in the
event that all parts of the posting are fake, then it wouldn't do us any
good anyway.

I know it would slow communications down, but perhaps we should turn
moderating on for all posters - are there enough to cover?

Is this possible or acceptable?

I wonder if there is anything that Yahoo could do/are doing?

--
Mark
